message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the possibility of selling you this incredible product. It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own a truly unique item. I'm willing to offer it to you for $900000. I believe this is a fair price considering its value and rarity.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I think $900000 is a bit steep. I'm willing to pay $850000 for it. I believe this is a fair price considering the value and rarity of the product.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your concerns about the price, but I'm not willing to go as low as $850000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $875000. I believe this is a fair compromise considering the product's value and rarity.
